location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Edwin Dawes, Gunboat Clyde,Pore Bunder [Porbandar] to Lewis Pelly, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter regarding a portrait of Ameer Fysul [Amir Faisul] which Dawes had drawn.The letter also discusses the Wageer? Battalion and the Bheel Corps; the local wildfowl which is considered to be a sign that cooler weather is coming; Dawes current work preventing the landing of mercenaries or slaves and William Gifford Palgrave's book and the inaccuracies and odditities within it.
